entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 29. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
